layout.grid_system: Bento Grid Protocol (Mode B: High Density)

structure.main_container: h-screen w-full flex flex-col overflow-hidden bg-background text-foreground
structure.header: h-14 border-b border-border flex items-center px-6 justify-between bg-background/50 backdrop-blur-xl z-50
structure.editor_pane: flex-1 flex flex-col min-w-[300px] border-r border-border

customization_rules: Buttons: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-md), no full pills for main actions
Inputs: High contrast borders on focus

specific_components.ast_viewer: React Flow or Visx for tree visualization

visual_enhancements.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl and bg-background/70 for floating panels and modals
visual_enhancements.borders: Use 1px subtle borders (border-border) to define areas. Avoid heavy shadows.
visual_enhancements.gradients: No full-screen gradients. Use subtle 'glow' effects for active states.
visual_enhancements.animations: Micro-interactions on hover. Smooth transitions for panel resizing.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup: Ensure Tailwind is configured for dark mode class strategy.
2. Layout: Implement the main 3-pane layout (Source, Target, AST) using a resizable split-pane library if possible, or CSS Grid.
3. Editor: Integrate Monaco Editor. Ensure it resizes correctly.
4. AST: Create a visualization component. If actual AST data is complex, start with a mock tree structure using React Flow.
5. MCP: Build the MCP configuration modal with form validation.
6. Theme: Default to Dark Mode. Add a toggle in the header.
7. Testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
